channel.title: NMS:BIDU on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NMS:BIDU on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Baidu Shares Surge as Analyst Upgrades on In-House Chip Venture
item.description: Baidu Inc. shares jumped by the most in over two years after an analyst upgraded the Chinese internet firm, citing the growth potential for its in-house chip business.

item.title: Baidu Shares Surge as Analyst Upgrades on In-House Chip Venture
item.description: Baidu Inc. shares jumped by the most in over two years after an analyst upgraded the Chinese internet firm, citing the growth potential for its in-house chip business.

item.title: Baidu Ranks as China’s Cheapest Internet Stock Amid AI Concerns
item.description: Sharp stock underperformance for Baidu Inc. on concerns over its outlook have left it trading at the cheapest valuation among China’s major internet firms.

item.title: Baidu Ranks as China’s Cheapest Internet Stock Amid AI Concerns
item.description: Sharp stock underperformance for Baidu Inc. on concerns over its outlook have left it trading at the cheapest valuation among China’s major internet firms.

item.title: Alibaba to Baidu Lead Surge in Equity-Linked Bond Sales in Asia
item.description: Asian sales of bonds that can be turned into shares have soared in 2025, heading toward multiyear highs, as interest rates remain elevated and rallying stocks create the right conditions for this corn
